contact_points.description: End of the wrench handle (lever arm)
contact_points.usage: Primary grasp point. Use this contact point to hold the wrench for maximum torque leverage.

functional_points.description: Inside the wrench head (jaws), where the bolt flats are engaged
functional_points.usage: Functional interaction point for tightening/loosening a bolt head. This point is used to seat the wrench onto the bolt and apply torque.

frame_hint.approach_note: If the task says 'slide onto / seat onto / insert onto the bolt', use translation along +z of the FUNCTIONAL frame (V = [0,0,1,0,0,0] in FUNCTIONAL).
frame_hint.action_note: If the task says 'tighten / loosen', use rotation around +y of the FUNCTIONAL frame (V = [0,0,0,0,1,0] in FUNCTIONAL).
frame_hint.disambiguation: If both alignment and seating are required, split into two steps: (1) rotate-only alignment (Ï‰), (2) translate-only approach (v) along approach_axis.
